name: Appeal pending when reconsideration issued
text:
[§392-80]  Appeal pending when reconsideration issued.  In the event that an appeal is pending as of the date a reconsideration thereof is issued, the appeal, unless withdrawn, shall be treated as an appeal from the reconsideration. [L 1969, c 148, pt of §1]
 
Rules of Court
 
  Applicability of Hawaii Rules of Civil Procedure, see HRCP rule 81(b)(12).
